name: Alchemy Rock Paper Scissors Themed
description:
I hope you have fun playing this game where you combine rocks, paper, and scissors to make new materials.

I will be updating this game if you would like to see a update please ask for it in the comments.

items you can make:

cardboard, shredded cardboard, shredded paper, paper slingshot, double rock shotgun, broken scissors, rock rifle, paper bayonet, paper ball surprise, flint, fire, iron bar, hammer, metal sheet.

play by click the item you want then grabbing and pulling it over the other object that you would like to combine.

feel free to hit the donate button.
